name: Unified Restaked LST
description: Introducing Unified Restaked LST (urLRT), a streamlined solution for yield and security in EVM DeFi. Leveraging restaking innovations from Symbiotic and Mellow, urLRT offers users diverse yield opportunities and enhanced security through layered staking. Quasar, the curator of the urLRT vault, is dedicated to responsible management and remains consistently engaged with the community. By unifying multiple staking layers, urLRT simplifies access to yield while fostering collaboration in automation, security, and interoperability, creating a seamless DeFi experience.
